definition: someone who is or has been segregated, separate or isolate (one thing) from another and place in a group apart from others
details:
noun
- someone who is or has been segregated
verb
- separate or isolate (one thing) from another and place in a group apart from others
= example: separate or isolate (one thing) from another and place in a group apart from others
- divide from the main body or mass and collect
= example: divide from the main body or mass and collect
- separate by race or religion
